description: Unlike most main characters, he is closer to a villain than a hero. He doesn`t hesitate to abuse the needs of people, sell out his friends to save himself, run away from any dangers, or ditch others who helped him if he doesn`t have any more interest in them. His life starts to change when he finds a magical Genie named Djinn who will to grant him three wishes. As most people would benefit from having three wishes, in his case it leads him to a lot of trouble, and it doesn`t take long before he tries to escape from Djinn, as well as every other person he meets.
name: Gokudou Yuccot Kikansky
